mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND user_pw = password(#{user_pw}) LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_id, user_pw, user_name, post, address, extra_address, detail_address) VALUES(#{user_id}, password(#{user_pw}), #{user_name}, #{post}, #{address}, #{extra_address}, #{detail_address})
